website_summaries.verdict: Impressive gaming performance in a stylish, convenient package.
pros: 2.8GHz Quad-Core Intel i7 processor and 16GB of RAM offer solid gaming performance
Features NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti graphics and hybrid drive storage with 2TB HDD and 256GB SSD
15.6" anti-glare screen is clear and crisp, and keyboard is backlit with LEDs
Wears USB-C port, USB 2.0 port, two USB 3.0 ports, and HDMI port for peripherals
cons: Some users have reported issues with certain keys failing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value, definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the Legion Y520. Less than a week and already put solid time on GTA V and Doom, very high settings with great fps. i7, 16gb RAM, 2 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD model. Looks aggressive, and great display for gaming. I pair this with the Srocker C10 wireless/noiseless mouse and Skullcandy Crusher headphones (bass-boost).
customer_reviews.author: Anders D.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop with good performance and features.
customer_reviews.text: Great PC. I’m a Dell user and have been for many years. I bought this Lenovo for my husband as that is the type of computer he uses and he needed an upgrade. I may be a new convert to Lenovo!! I love this laptop! I love that it has a numbers keypad on the laptop, the size and weight are great, performance is fantastic. I bought it for the performance so we could use it for trading stocks. I haven’t discovered all of the features yet but what I have discovered I love.
customer_reviews.author: D. King

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop and Play DOTA2 and they all work super smooth. My Revit Models are enormous and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a VR/BIM modeler and gamer at times. I use REVIT, 3dsMAX, CAD, SketchUp, Photoshop and Play DOTA2 and they all work super smooth. My Revit Models are enormous and it can handle it very well. I am SO happy with this laptop! The red keyboard is not too intense as it may look, you can turn on/adjust the keyboard light also. There is no disc drive or VGA you have to use either USB-C or HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: So fast, so clear, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So fast, so clear, so good. Everything about this Laptop is exactly what I hoped it would be. I told my daughter; "It's so nice to make a big purchase and be totally satisfied and have all your expectations met." That's exactly how I feel about this. Runs every game we've got at max graphics. I am in love with this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: BTJPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop due to the price and its characteristics. I used to have a Lenovo y700 laptop but the GPU failed without reason so I had many doubts whether to buy this equipment or not. So far there's no problem with this one, I haven't tried playing games or heavy load on the CPU or GPU but for what I can see this machine flies! Will make an update as soon as I play some games in this beast...

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: For my needs as an audio engineer, it works great. I sometimes had up to six power hungry programs running and had no issues. Only problem I did have was one of the LEDs dying. There was a white bar that ran vertically across the entire screen. I returned it for a refund and replaced it with a Y700, which is quite comparable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Sansing

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was told that the fastest laptops are gaming computers. I bought this computer because I wanted a super fast computer that was reliable though I don't plan to play any games on it. The Lenovo Y520 did not disappoint! This is the fastest laptop I have ever seen and at a price that I could afford. I have read all the positive and negative reviews and after having this baby for 1 month I can honestly say that I cannot find anything about it yet that I don't like. If you are looking for a fast computer that delivers look no further than the Y520!

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you use a mouse also
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price but found cheaper at the egg store (june 2018). Also the touchpad left right buttons are TERRIBLE, I would only advise this computer if you're going to use a mouse. There's a weird rocker assembly that makes it hard to push at the center and easy on the outside with no tactile ability to determine where the middle is. What's wrong with 2 buttons? Had I known about this "feature" I'd have gotten a different computer. At first I thought the buttons were so stiff they weren't built right.
customer_reviews.author: you wiah

customer_reviews.title: bad wireless card, bad speakers, generally quirky and poorly functioning
customer_reviews.text: Wireless card does not function properly. Speakers are pretty low-quality (I often have to switch to my headphones). Shutting the laptop to go to "sleep mode" results in the fan spinning up to near max, then running down, then spinning up again, etc. in ~10 min cycles. All of these problems are solvable, but I didn't spend ~$1k for a laptop I have to fix in order to enjoy the most basic functions a laptop should be expected to perform. It's one of the worst laptops I've ever used, and I'm extremely disappointed I bought it (direct from Lenovo, too).
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: I really love my Y520 laptop
customer_reviews.text: I really love my Y520 laptop. It is so fast and it can handle anything and everything. I love that it has a 1050Ti graphics card build in! That's the fastest built in graphics card of today. The only downsides to this laptop are that it's heavy and the battery only lasts about 2.5 hours. This laptop is such a powerhouse that it actually replaces my gaming PC. Go Lenovo!

customer_reviews.title: Robbery.
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, first use and already.. boot issues. Haven't been able to so much as check a website. This is the first time I've ever had a laptop that gave trouble straight out of the box. And returning it/exchanging it is a HUGE inconvenience since I'm not blessed enough to live in America. I have never been more disappointed with a pc/laptop purchase. If I could give less stars, I would.

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these laptops from Lenovo, and always had issues with boot up taking forever. Basically a lot of these y520s were sold with defective HDDs and Lenovo knew about it. If you figure that out after you are out of warranty, you are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Hissing sound from fans
customer_reviews.text: Many users have hissing fan noise problem. I got it on the second day of use. Noise appear after reboot on AC power, regardless of CPU load. Noise will disappear if 1) I plug and unplug AC cord, or 2) If I close and open lid (windows control panel power setting: if lid closed -> do nothing). This trouble has to be fixed by Lenovo on BIOS or driver level. BIOS has no fan control profile, basically no control options. BTW I still have time to return this computer to the seller...
customer_reviews.author: V. Ivanov
